isis-node-attributes.level.Description: Level of an IS-IS node - can be level-1,level-2 or level-all.

isis-node-attributes.area-address.Description: List of areas supported by the protocol instance

isis-node-attributes.lsp-lifetime.Description: Lifetime of the router's LSPs in seconds.

isis-node-attributes.lsp-refresh-interva.Description: Refresh interval of the router's LSPs in seconds.

isis-timer-attributes.lsp-lifetime.Description: Lifetime of the router's LSPs in seconds.

isis-timer-attributes.lsp-refresh-interv.Description: Refresh interval of the router's LSPs in seconds.

isis-timer-attributes.poi-tlv.Description: POI TLV  of the router's LSPs.
